scripts.coverage: ([ src/aberdeen.ts -nt tests/build/aberdeen.js ] && tsc -t ES2015 -m commonjs --outdir tests/build src/aberdeen.ts) ; nyc mocha --file tests/_init.js tests/[^_]*.js
scripts.test: ([ src/aberdeen.ts -nt tests/build/aberdeen.js ] && tsc -t ES2015 -m commonjs --outdir tests/build src/aberdeen.ts) ; mocha --file tests/_init.js tests/[^_]*.js
